author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Estonian Food Month 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Estonian Food Month 2015 Published on : Friday, September 4, 2015
In September 2015, the Estonian Food Month will be celebrated for the first time. It is a time when crops are ripening in Estonian fields, gardens and forests.
This abundance and variety is celebrated across Estonia in larger and smaller cities and towns with food festivals and fairs where good Estonian food takes centre stage.
For the first time, the Estonian Food Month is also celebrated in restaurants. Several top chefs in Estonia will select their favourites from among local raw produce and make a truly exciting dish served only in the course of the Estonian Food Month.
Source:- Visit Estonia
